meta.description:
Remember “Smokey Bear”?  “A Mind is a Terrible Thing to Waste”? Now comes the Ad-Council’s biggest campaign ever — a “Moon Shot” — to sell COVID vaccine.

For viral content, in-depth insights and breaking news be sure to follow David Knight on Parler and Twitter @Libertytarian

title: Ad-Council’s “Moon Shot” — Vaccine Propaganda Biggest Campaign EVER
